text.section:
Except for docks or wharves owned, controlled, or operated by the Administration, this title does not:
Impose any duty on the Administration as to the safety of any person using any waters;
Render the Administration liable for any loss of life, injury, or damage to any person or property because of any obstruction in or unsafe condition of any part of the waters; or
Render the Administration liable for any failure to adopt or enforce any rule or regulation under this title.
The powers in this section may not be exercised in any county unless the county approves the operations of the Administration in the county.

section.section:
Any ordinance or regulation that was adopted before June 1, 1959 by any State agency, political subdivision, or other public body and that relates to a subject matter over which authority is granted to the Administration by subsection (a) of this section:
Continues to be in effect, except as otherwise provided in this subsection;
Has the status of a regulation adopted by the Administration; and
Like other regulations of the Administration, may be readopted, amended, or repealed by the Administration.
Only the Administration may readopt, amend, or repeal these ordinances or regulations.
